description.value:
Your deceptions confound even the most powerful mortal divinations. Detection, revelation, and scrying effects pass right over you, your possessions, and your auras, detecting nothing unless the detecting effect has a counteract level of 10 or higher.

For example, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Detect Magic] would still detect other magic in the area but not any magic on you, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.True Seeing] wouldn't reveal you, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Locate] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Scrying] wouldn't find you, and so on.
